paragraphs.content:
Are you interested in making a difference in peoples lives?

Would you like to be a part of something amazing?

We are looking to recruit a person to join our team working in the Emergency Night Shelter in a full-time capacity, supporting those who come into our service throughout the night looking for support and shelter.  

This position is waking nights on a 4 nights on, 4 nights off rota, welcoming and supporting those who have no other shelter. 

This is a unique opportunity to work for a Pioneering Charity, building relationships with some of the most vulnerable people in our society. 

Download the full job description and person specification.

To apply, please send in your CV and Cover letter to: [info@graih.org.im](mailto:info@graih.org.im)

Applications must be recieved by 5pm Friday 12th August 2022.
paragraphs.heading: Night Shelter Support Worker - Full Time Position
Relief/Bank Night shelter Support Worker
paragraphs.content:
We are always willing to hear from people who would be interested in joining our team at Graih as a relief support worker in the Emergency Night Shelter.

This will be to provide cover in the Night Shelter when a gap arises and will be on an as and when basis. This is a great opportunity to get to know the Charity, the staff team and our Guests.

Download the full job description and person specification.

If this is something you are interested in, Please contact us on: [info@graih.org.im](mailto:info@graih.org.im) 

There is no closing date for this position, we are always interested in widening our relief support worker pool.
